title: Riginac111
author: Riginac111
content: Our country nigeria is suffering for economic inflation / recession and since this current president resume office in villa the course of commodities is going up everyday, so I dey say for we to buried this inflation forever, is for our government to legalized the use of cryptocurrency so that people will invest with bitcoin and also trade with bitcoin. But I dey see say if we want to balance this our country naija we have to invest for bitcoin. I wan make other people put mouth for this matter because the suffering is much and course of food's are high, let us give bitcoin chance and check weather if we invest with bitcoin things will normalize

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Truth be told my friend, legalizing BTC in 9ja no go fit save our country from recession (i.e fall in the value of our currency) but rather if you invest in BTC or Dollar, it can save you and your investment  from recession (i.e preventing your investment from losing value due to the fall in the value of our Naira currency). Because there are several factors that make a country go into recession, such as when a nation rely more on import than they export, which Bitcoin is in no way a remedy to that, and as such, legalizing it will only create mass adoption, and sometimes a slight pump in price, but not saving you from recession.

If you check very well most of our currency doesn't have value again such as 5, 10, and 20 naira, you can hardly find something that's worth the amount because of price inflation.

comments.author: Promocodeudo
comments.created_time: August 17, 2023, 07:23:22 AMLast edit: August 18, 2023, 12:27:23 PM by Promocodeudo
comments.body: In the aspect of legalizing or adopting Bitcoin as a legal tender to fight inflation, I think it is a bit difficult for Nigerian to fight inflation or recession with Bitcoin, even though Nigeria government allows Bitcoin to scale through in their country, it wouldn't still solve their enormous economic defects, the major problem of Nigeria is lack of production to meet up with their domestic consumption, Nigeria virtually imports everything needed by its citizens and this keeps weakening the naira, most of this countries compel them to exchange dollar for transactions, the only commodity Nigeria has in large quantity is crude, this crude is exported to other countries by a means called direct sells and direct purchase system, a situation where Nigeria use their crude to get all petroleum product directly from the country or firms that they exported the crude to, taxes are involved, my question is, why is it difficult for the government to repair or even privatize the refineries as the case may be,  in this kind of economy bitcoin will only serve as a means of transaction and store of wealth for individual but when it comes to solving the problem of inflation or recession, is very big No for bitcoin here. Do you know that our domestic and foreign debts are higher than our foreign reserves, what do you think, despite how convoluted our internal and external economic woes are, we can start from somewhere to make it right.
